> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

A Fragment which represents a _Custom Error_.

## Extends

- [`NamedFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/NamedFragment)

## Properties

| Property | Modifier | Type | Description | Inherited from |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `inputs` | `readonly` | readonly [`ParamType`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/ParamType)[] | The inputs for the fragment. | [`NamedFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/NamedFragment).`inputs` |
| `name` | `readonly` | `string` | The name of the fragment. | [`NamedFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/NamedFragment).`name` |
| `type` | `readonly` | [`FragmentType`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/FragmentType) | The type of the fragment. | [`NamedFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/NamedFragment).`type` |
